# What is string manipulation 

- the process of handling and analyzing strings;

- It comprises of various string parsing and manipulation techniques that can be sued to extract text patterns, modify strings and data wrangling

- Most data in the digital world contains text, and hence, preparing such data for analysis requires significant amount of string manipulation techniques
